'''luarocks-admin''' is the repository management tool for LuaRocks, a module deployment system for Lua.

== Usage ==

:'''luarocks-admin ''command'' <nowiki>[</nowiki>''arguments''<nowiki>]</nowiki>...'''

== Supported commands ==

* [[help.wiki|help]] - Help on commands.
* [[make-manifest.wiki|make-manifest]] - Compile a manifest file for a repository.
* [[add.wiki|add]] - Add a rock or rockspec to a rocks server.
* [[remove_(luarocks-admin).wiki|remove]] - Remove a rock or rockspec from a rocks server.
* [[refresh-cache.wiki|refresh-cache]] - Refresh local cache of a remote rocks server.
